author: Craft Computing
description:
Thanks to Meter for sponsoring today's episode. If you're interested in learning more about how Meter can help with your IT Infrastructure, go to https://meter.com/craftcomputing to book a demo today.

Grab yourself a Pint Glass at https://craftcomputing.store

Last month, I picked up an 8-Node Supermicro Microcloud on eBay for just $399. An older platform, sure, but at just $50 per node, it's one of the cheapest ways to add a TON of nodes or clusters to your homelab. And I'm starting to think there's a reason it was so cheap.

But first... What am I drinking???

Drekker Brewing (Fargo, ND) Percentage of Survival IPA (7.0%)

*Links to items below may be affiliate links for which I may be compensated*

Check out the Supermicro 5037MR-H8TRF on eBay: https://ebay.us/gA6OCD
Sliding Rails for Microcloud: https://ebay.us/vLWdHx
Intel Xeon E5-2561v2 12-Core (10-Pack): https://ebay.us/e9ydi8
Supermicro AOC-CTG-L1S 10Gb SFP+ Adapter: https://ebay.us/KzjwcY

Download my custom PCIe bracket adap
title: Installing Proxmox on my X79 Microcloud was beyond frustrating...
